00017 /*
00018   This file contains classes corresponding to window layouts
00019   defined in resources/mygui/ *.xml.
00020 
00021   Each class inherites GUI::Layout and loads the XML file, and
00022   provides some helper functions to manipulate the elements of the
00023   window.
00024 
00025   The windows are never created or destroyed (except at startup and
00026   shutdown), they are only hid. You can control visibility with
00027   setVisible().
00028  */
00029

00089   class InventoryWindow : public OEngine::GUI::Layout
00090   {
00091   public:
00092     enum CategoryMode
00093       {
00094         CM_All = 0,      // All items
00095         CM_Weapon = 1,   // Only weapons
00096         CM_Apparel = 2,  // Apparel
00097         CM_Magic = 3,    // Magic
00098         CM_Misc = 4      // Misc
00099       };
00100 
00101     InventoryWindow ()
00102       : Layout("openmw_inventory_window_layout.xml")
00103       , categoryMode(CM_All)
00104 
00105       // color should be fetched from skin
00106       , activeColor(0, 0, 1)
00107       , inactiveColor(0.7, 0.7, 0.7)
00108     {
00109       setCoord(0, 200, 600, 400);
00110 
00111       // These are just demo values, you should replace these with
00112       // real calls from outside the class later.
00113 
00114       mMainWidget->setCaption("Glass Frostsword");
00115       setText("EncumbranceBarT", "176/210");
00116 
00117       MyGUI::ProgressPtr pt;
00118       getWidget(pt, "EncumbranceBar");
00119       pt->setProgressRange(210);
00120       pt->setProgressPosition(176);
00121 
00122       MyGUI::WidgetPtr avatar;
00123       getWidget(avatar, "Avatar");
00124 
00125       // Adjust armor rating text to bottom of avatar widget
00126       MyGUI::StaticTextPtr armor_rating;
00127       getWidget(armor_rating, "ArmorRating");
00128       armor_rating->setCaption("Armor: 11");
00129       MyGUI::IntCoord coord = armor_rating->getCoord();
00130       coord.top = avatar->getCoord().height - 4 - coord.height;
00131       armor_rating->setCoord(coord);
00132 
00133       names[0] = "All";
00134       names[1] = "Weapon";
00135       names[2] = "Apparel";
00136       names[3] = "Magic";
00137       names[4] = "Misc";
00138 
00139       boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00140         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00141       } };
00142 
00143       // Initialize buttons with text and adjust sizes, also mark All as active button
00144       int margin = 2;
00145       int last_x = 0;
00146       for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00147       {
00148           CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00149           std::string name = names[mode];
00150           name += "Button";
00151           setText(name, names[mode]);
00152           getWidget(buttons[mode], name);
00153 
00154           MyGUI::ButtonPtr &button_pt = buttons[mode];
00155           if (mode == CM_All)
00156               button_pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00157           else
00158               button_pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00159           MyGUI::IntCoord coord = button_pt->getCoord();
00160           coord.left = last_x;
00161           last_x += coord.width + margin;
00162           button_pt->setCoord(coord);
00163 
00164           button_pt->eventMouseButtonClick = MyGUI::newDelegate(this, &InventoryWindow::onCategorySelected);
00165       }
00166     }
00167 
00168     void setCategory(CategoryMode mode)
00169     {
00170         MyGUI::ButtonPtr pt = getCategoryButton(categoryMode);
00171         pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00172 
00173         pt = getCategoryButton(mode);
00174         pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00175         categoryMode = mode;
00176     }
00177 
00178     MyGUI::ButtonPtr getCategoryButton(CategoryMode mode)
00179     {
00180         return buttons[mode];
00181     }
00182 
00183     void onCategorySelected(MyGUI::Widget *widget)
00184     {
00185         boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00186         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00187         } };
00188 
00189         for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00190         {
00191             CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00192             if (widget == buttons[mode])
00193             {
00194                 setCategory(mode);
00195                 return;
00196             }
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     CategoryMode categoryMode;        // Current category filter
00201     MyGUI::ButtonPtr buttons[5];    // Button pointers
00202     std::string names[5];            // Names of category buttons
00203 
00204     MyGUI::Colour activeColor;
00205     MyGUI::Colour inactiveColor;
00206   };
